content:
The list gets off the screen when the list is too long.Untitled.png

It this non-trivial enough to give a thought to (like adding a scroll)?
Also, The list can get extremely long with large organisations.
I thought at one point we limited the number of search suggestions. This is definitely something we need to address. I think we want to both make the list shorter and add scrolling as needed.
I think adding a scroll is a feasible solution.

But how can we address the "limiting # of suggestion" part?
For instance, in the image we see "narrow to stream *" listed. Will we limit the # of similar 'narrow to stream X'?
If we show the entire list of streams and if an organisation has several streams, this list will by default be long.
We could limit the number of streams by some sort of relevance factor, like how long it's been since I narrowed to the stream.
We could definitely improve search suggestions in a lot of ways!
One thing I could think of is adding topic names as suggestions, if people find that useful
I believe we only autocomplete topic names once you enter a stream name, which I think mostly makes sense, but I could see re-visiting that decision.
Ahh, that's why it didn't popup when I tried with "search suggestions"
There's an existing open issue for this going off the screen. I think we should probably not be listing every stream there; it doesn't seem useful
